content:
Anyone that uses Special Menu Items I'd love a little testing on the latest commits before I make a new release. Latest head includes some commits ported from D7. I'd especially appreciate testing on this branch (including code review since I was winging it): https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/special_menu_items/issues/7

Clicking on the special menu items from the manage menu links admin page leads to "page not found". · Issue #7 · backdrop-contrib/special_menu_items
The requested page "/%3Cnolink%3E" could not be found. The requested page "/%3Cseparator%3E" could not be found. Perhaps render all <nolink> menu items as plain text inste...

Another one for review:
https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/special_menu_items/pull/14/files

#1: Use radios instead of special paths by laryn · Pull Request #14 · backdrop-contrib/special_menu_items
Have a question about this project? Sign up for a free GitHub account to open an issue and contact its maintainers and the community.

@klonos If you have any free time :grinning: I've got a PR for you to review, based on a ticket you filed in 2016:
https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/special_menu_items/issues/7#issuecomment-597772789

Clicking on the special menu items from the manage menu links admin page leads to "page not found". · Issue #7 · backdrop-contrib/special_menu_items
The requested page "/%3Cnolink%3E" could not be found. The requested page "/%3Cseparator%3E" could not be found. Perhaps render all <nolink> menu items as plain text inste...
Oh, and the other PR is for a ticket you filed in 2015! :stuck_out_tongue:

@klonos Are you the person to talk to when the project installer grabs the wrong version? It looks like it's still sending 1.x of Special Menu Items instead of 2.x. https://backdropcms.org/project/special_menu_items
@Laryn He's not the only one :wink: I've fixed that for you.
